cards.content: Zero-OS has been designed from the bottom up, started from scratch from a Linux kernel. It is a stateless and scalable operating system with a lightweight architecture that makes it cost and energy-efficient. Zero-OS eliminates multiple layers of complexity, enabling the delivery compute and storage everywhere, much closer to the source of the hardware.

cards.title: Zero People

cards.content: Autonomous IT means self-driving and self-healing. A major efficiency gain comes from removing the human requirement for deploying and operating IT infrastructure and services. Instead, a Smart Contract for IT autonomously handles all the required actions on the ThreeFold Grid. Zero people means no opportunities for human error or malicious intent.

headerSolution4.subtitle: Introducing 3Node
headerSolution4.content: 3Node enables everyone to extend the ThreeFold Grid. It is powered by ThreeFold technology that permits tech users to host their IT workloads in the most advanced internet architecture in the world.
